aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes

Class Ray2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes.Ray2D

  • public final class Ray2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a ray in a two-dimensional Cartesian plot.
    A ray is represented by a Point2D and a directional Vector2D.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ray2D(double startX, double startY, double endX, double endY) 
      Ray2D(Point2D start, Vector2D direction) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Vector2D getDirection() 
      Point2D getStart() 
      Ray2D transform(TransformMatrix2D matrix)
      Calculates a transformation matrix onto the ray.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ray2D

        public Ray2D(Point2D start,
             Vector2D direction)
        Parameters:
        start - the initial point from that the ray originates.
        direction - the direction in which the ray beams.

      • Ray2D

        public Ray2D(double startX,
             double startY,
             double endX,
             double endY)
        Parameters:
        startX - the X coordinate of the initial point from which the ray originates.
        startY - the Y coordinate of the initial point from which the ray originates.
        endX - the X coordinate of any point on the ray that is different from the start.
        endY - the Y coordinate of any point on the ray that is different from the start.

    • Method Detail

      • getStart

        public Point2D getStart()
        Returns:
        the origin of the ray.

      • getDirection

        public Vector2D getDirection()
        Returns:
        the direction of the ray.

      • transform

        public Ray2D transform(TransformMatrix2D matrix)
        Calculates a transformation matrix onto the ray.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the TransformMatrix2D that gets calculated into this ray.
        Returns:
        the transformed ray.
